Saintess of Elmore-Aden Solina:
At last we met. I already wait long ago for your arrival... About you to me spoke itself Eihasad... I know, on the road here you made many feats! My soul so long doesn't leave this place... I shall transfer the important message to the one who will save this world and will open all truth.
"You are Sacred Solia from Elmoreden?"
